page.title: 17FAMILY LIFE, WORDSLEY 1980'S
page.content: {Life in Wordsley}is typical of many other areas in the{West Midlands. Nuclear families live in semi-detached and detached homes, most of them privately owned. In many instances,the extended family also lives in the district. Most families care for their homes and gardens and are frequently seen painting and decorating, gardening or cleaning the family car. There are very few homes without at least one television, usually colour, and sometimes the children may have a second television in their bedrooms.It is not uncommon to find such items as video recorders,hi-fi systems and home computers in many homes, as well as the usual time-saving devices such as vacuum cleaners and automatic washing machines. Children are frequently seen riding their bicycles, roller skating and skateboarding.
